DOC.brief_summary: This study test cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) behavioral weight loss ( BWL ) treatment obese patient binge eat disorder ( BED ) . The study involve comparison three treatment condition : ( 1 ) CBT ; ( 2 ) BWL , ( 3 ) sequential ( two-part ) treatment consist CBT follow BWL .
DOC.criteria: Binge Eating Overweight Pregnancy Current cardiac disease Serious neurologic illness
